attributes.action: pass a new law giving shareholders the power to block exorbitant pay-offs to company bosses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should pass a new law giving shareholders the power to block exorbitant pay-offs to company bosses.

Put an end to the outrageous series of fat-cat packages for ousted executives agreed by an incestuous boardroom elite. Why should they be rewarded for ruining the lives of others.
